edu.bard.drab.PCLT
Class LaserPoint

java.lang.Object
  edu.bard.drab.PCLT.LaserPoint

public class LaserPoint
extends java.lang.Object

LaserPoint describes a laser point both in terms of camera and screen coordinates.

Author:
Keith O'Hara
